column4: Hi.  Running 8.10 on a dell netbook - is there anything I can do about fixed-height windows running off the bottom of my screen?
the 'eeebuntu' wiki page have some tweaks for that.. one tweak lets you 'alt-click' and drag a window UP past the panel so you can get to the bottom of the windows
Tar the whole dir to a file.. using theproper commands and burn archive to dvd is a good way also
found this: http://forum.eeebuntu.org/viewtopic.php?f=7&t=2019 and seems to work.  Cheers for the heads up
